pageProps.content:
Experience

Situated on a dammed estuary in a high-water table area – Waterbuck Lodge has the ideal location in the heart of the Thornybush Game Reserve in South Africa.
This is the ideal destination to experience the abundance of life that water attracts – including the largest elephant herd in the reserve.
Since the lodge & small & intimate (& can be booked on an exclusive use basis), Waterbuck Lodge is a wonderful choice for families or friends looking for a private or exclusive safari experience.

Stay

Each of the 4 air-conditioned suites has been built with absolute privacy in mind & offers beautiful views across the African terrain. Each suite has been individually decorated & features a generous en-suite bathroom.
The main lodge area includes a large thatched open-plan dining & lounge area as well as a breakfast deck with a bar & a large family-sized pool overlooking the estuary.

Activities

Morning & afternoon game drives are conducted in open 4x4 vehicles & led by experienced rangers & trackers who share a passion for the bush & the environment.
Exciting walking safaris are ideal for those looking to learn more about animal tracking or local fauna & flora.
Guests can also book a scenic hot air balloon ride over the Blyde River at an additional cost, or visit one of the nearby local communities.

subfolders.title: Jackalberry Lodge
subfolders.description: Jackalberry Lodge is named after the jackalberry tree, a bushveld icon that provides shade & protection from predators.  Like its namesake, the lodge offers guests a tranquil safari experience in understated elegance. With a prime location in the Thornybush Nature Reserve, Jackalberry Lodge provides the perfect environment to reconnect with wild Africa against the backdrop of the Northern Drakensberg. The Thornybush Nature Reserve forms part of the Greater Kruger & is home to Africa’s Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino – as well as a variety of other animals & birds.

subfolders.title: Kubili House
subfolders.description: Kubili House is a 26,900 sq foot private residence set within the Thornybush Game Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park.  The house boasts a spectacular location on the bank of the largest dam in the reserve, attracting a variety of wildlife & birds. This private safari residence offers a safari lifestyle with a dedicated game ranger, vehicle & chef, ensuring personalized service & complete privacy.  There is no set safari program at Kubili House.  Instead, activities are tailored to guests’ requirements. The residence includes 5 en-suite bedrooms, 3 swimming pools, a spa & steam room & 3 fully equipped camping vehicles.

subfolders.title: Monwana Lodge
subfolders.description: Situated in a quiet corner in the renowned Thornybush Game Reserve, Monwana Lodge offers wildlife encounters that will take your breath away. This area is home to a variety of animals, including the Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino – as well other game like zebra, impala, giraffe, cheetah & many bird species. The lodge overlooks a game-packed waterhole - one of the biggest drawcards in the area - so exciting game viewing opportunities can be enjoyed from the comfort of the viewing deck.

subfolders.title: N'Kaya Lodge
subfolders.description: Adjacent to the Kruger National Park, in the heart of the Thornybush Game Reserve, you will find the intimate & exclusive N’Kaya Lodge.   N’Kaya offers its guests the absolute best in privacy & is the ideal destination for a relaxing & peaceful African safari.  Frequent Big 5 sightings can be expected. The lodge only sleeps 8 people, making this a wonderful option for an exclusive safari experience.  Friends or families can book the entire camp & have a private safari in a beautiful & remote setting.

subfolders.title: Royal Malewane
subfolders.description: Royal Malewane is located within the beautiful Thornybush Game Reserve, a private concession deep in the heart of the Greater Kruger region. The lodge oozes luxury, style & elegance & provides guests with a grand safari experience where only the best china, service, food & wildlife can be enjoyed. At Royal Malewane there are 2 accommodation options – Main Lodge, which is classic & grand in style & The Farmstead, which is more intimate & contemporary.

subfolders.title: Saseka Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Saseka is the Tsonga word for Beautiful.  Set in the north-eastern portion of the game-rich Thornybush Nature Reserve in the Greater Kruger, Saseka is elegantly positioned on the banks of the Monwana dry-riverbed.   The lodge is state-of-the-art, luxurious & imbued with the idyllic African wilderness.  Saseka’s design means it is suitable for couples on a romantic journey as well as families with children. It is a small & intimate camp: there are only 8 tented suites plus a 2-bedroom villa.

subfolders.title: Serondella Lodge
subfolders.description: Serondella Lodge is located within the Thornbush Game Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park in South Africa & is home to the Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino. Right in front of the lodge, an active waterhole invites plenty of wildlife to come & drink during the day.  Because of the ideal location, guests often have excellent game viewing opportunities from the comfort of their viewing decks. Serondella Lodge is small & intimate, so is ideal for couples or a large family who is looking for a private safari experience.  There are only 4 luxurious suites, 2 of which make up the 2-bedroom family suite.

subfolders.title: Shumbalala Game Lodge
subfolders.description: Deep in the heart of the African bushveld, lies Shumbalala Lodge – a luxurious safari camp set in a quiet corner of the Thornybush Game Reserve in South Africa. Everything at Shumbalala is out of this world.  From the personalized service, romantic atmosphere, spacious suites & spectacular wildlife viewing, Shumbalala never fails to impress. The lodge wants to remain small & intimate & therefore only allows 8 guests to stay at one time.  The luxurious suites are each equipped with an open fireplace, outside shower & private viewing deck.

subfolders.title: Tamboti Villa
subfolders.description: Tamboti Villa is an exclusive-use safari haven nestled under a grove of Tamboti trees in the game-packed Thornybush Private Game Reserve. This private 4-bedroom villa comes with a dedicated chef, ranger & tracker – ensuring an exclusive safari experience in a relaxed setting. The permanent waterhole located in front of camp is a magnet for wildlife, especially herds of elephants & buffaloes, so guests can enjoy excellent game viewing from the comfort of the viewing deck!

subfolders.title: Thornybush Game Lodge
subfolders.description: Thornybush Game Lodge, a luxurious, family-friendly lodge in the Thornybush Game Reserve offers an exhilarating Big 5 safari experience to their guests. The lodge overlooks the seasonal Monwana River as well as a large waterhole, so guests can enjoy matchless wildlife viewing from the comfort of the viewing deck. The lodge is built in such a way to attract families, couples or honeymooners.

subfolders.title: Thornybush The River Lodge
subfolders.description: Thornybush The River Lodge is located within the Thornybush Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park & enjoys beautiful views over the seasonal Monwana River. The River Lodge offers a truly personalized, secluded wilderness experience – a seamless blend of Big encounters & 5-star luxury that restores body & soul. The small & intimate safari lodge features only 4 high-lofted air-conditioned thatched suites, each with an African chic theme, including the 2-bedroom Royal Suite.

This is the ideal destination to experience the abundance of life that water attracts – including the largest elephant herd in the reserve. Since the lodge & small & intimate (& can be booked on an exclusive use basis), Waterbuck Lodge is a wonderful choice for families or friends looking for a private or exclusive safari experience.
